channel.title: Audio signal processing
channel.description:
has any one done audio signal processing, writing two programs (both to do the same thing). 1. using portaudio (cross-platform capability) to capture raw audio from mic, then use a window function and FFT (fast fourier transform) it, at real time 2. using windows API, Wavein, to capture raw audio from mic, then use a window function and FFT it, at real time.
has anyone done anything similar, i am doing this in C, I know how to do FFT of an array containing real and imaginary number in C. but i am confused on how to do this at real time, while capturing data from mic, process it through FFT. Has any one done something like this or know any tut or resource if so please let me know. doesn't matter if it was in windows API.
